resources.string: Loud knocking to the door woke you up in the morning. On the threshold you saw the confidant of the king. He kindly invited you to the Royal Palace, saying that the matter is urgent. The king himself is waiting for you.\n Approaching the Royal palace, you wonder why the king needs to talk to a simple blacksmith…

My loyal subject, for the last time, my health began to weaken, and my sworn enemy King Bruenor from the southern lands is very powerful and aggressive.\n The Kingdom is in danger. If I die and the southerners come upon us, many innocent citizens of my Kingdom will perish.

Beyond the dry lands, on the East, the dark wizard lives. He possesses secret and powerful spell. If you come back with this spell, the Kingdom can be saved. You are known as one of the best blacksmiths of the Kingdom, your hand is strong and your will is like a steel. I ask you to do this favour for me.
The king has blessed you and wished you not to surrender in the face of difficulties. You have left the Palace and are ready to start the journey.
You\'ve come to the Eastern gates of the city. At the gates you met a guard who is interested in where you are going.
You told the guard about your plans to go beyond the Arden forest. He is very concerned about your story, and wishes you the help of the Almighty God.

No one has entered the Arden forest for many years. Rumor has it that at night there is a huge howl from the wolves, and at dawn you can meet the dead mermaids floating in the forest mist. Behind the Arden forest there are dry lands where you will give all your gold for a drop of water.
You came out to the East to the big valley. You enjoy fine weather, a light wind breezing blowing and birds sing. You have two days journey to the Arden forest through the valley.
The Great valley is beautiful, but you have long way to go.
You have passed the green valley and reached the edge of the Arden forest. There are many bad rumors about this forest, it\'s time to check which of them are true.

You passed some distance in the woods before dark. Strange rustling is heard around, in the distance you hear lingering howl of wolves. You need to sleep, but how to do it in such a disturbing environment?
You need to fall asleep in order to have the strength to continue the trip tomorrow.

In the dream you see a dark forest. The moon shines brightly through the trees. In the haze dark silhouette with a scythe is approaching you. The silhouette swings his scythe and screams \"Haaarrrrgh\".
Waking up, you see a big muscular wolf right in front of you. The wolf bared his teeth and prepares to attack.
You run away, dodging between trees, but the wolf does not lag behind and quickly overtakes you.
Wolf catches you up and knocks you down. Now you see the hungry eyes and bared teeth.
You grab a sharp stick, which lies next to you, and stab it into the wolf\'s throat. Blood splatters from the wound, and the wolf with a squeal jumps out of the way.
You grab the wolf by the tongue and pull it with big force. Wolf jumps out of the way with a squeal, the blood pouring from his mouth.
You leave the Arden forest, and on one of the trees in the distance you see a carved inscription. You wonder what is written there, but the wolf could still be somewhere nearby.
On the tree the inscription is engraved:\n \"It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness\".
You see a calm river in front of you. Looking around, you can\'t see the crossing on foot. Apparently, to continue the path you\'ll have to soak your feet.
Already passing the middle of the river, you see a strange movement aside. You turn around to understand the source of this movement.
You realize that the huge alligator is approaching you fast.You swim fast, but the alligator is even faster. You need to collect all your power not to stay at the bottom of this calm river forever.

You spent the night away from the river. In the morning you can see dry lands stretching for miles in front of you. The earth is all cracked from dryness. A small pitcher of water here will be more expensive than gold.

You are on the road for a few days, and the end of these dried up lands is still not visible. You\'re exhausted by heat and thirst. You want to lie down for a few hours, but you know you\'ll never get up.
You continue your trip through the dry lands. You notice the skull of some animal laying on the ground. This land of death always takes its toll.
You take the skull in your hands, when suddenly a snake crawls out of the orbit and bites you.
You take out an oblong flask with water from an eye socket. You drink all the water, and immediately feel an inflow of forces.
You went a few more miles through the dry lands. You need to collect all the forces not to die right here. Suddenly you hear scary sounds from the sky.
You lift your head and you see a big desert eagle flying right at you, exposing its claws. A few more seconds, and it will take you to the place, from where no one has returned.
The desert eagle rushes towards you.
You bounce to the side, and the eagle catches you with claws, cutting clothes and skin. You grab a stone lying on the ground, and when the eagle comes again, you beat it with a great force.
Your clothes are covered in blood. The eagle managed to tear your shoulder and chest. But the wounds don\'t seem dangerous.

Cautiously looking up to the sky, you have two days more continued the path through the dry lands. Finally, when the sun has already begun to set behind the horizon, you have reached the foot of the Dalai mountains.

In the morning you see all the splendor and power of the mountain chain in front of you. Mountains stretch for kilometers, going beyond the horizon. There is no workaround, you need to overcome the mountain.

The ascent was very hard. The cold wind blew right through to the bones. You tried not to look down, but sometimes you had to, and then the blood run cold. But now you are one of the few mortals who overcame the Dalai mountains.
You heard about this land from your grandfather, but it seems even he believed this is just a fairy tale. You see the red lands going beyond the horizon.

The ground around you is red from the heat. Sweat blinds your eyes, the heat makes you hard to breathe. The ground burns the feet even through the shoes. You have no more strength to go, but you remember the king\'s speech and his request…

You\'ve almost reached the end of the red lands. And then you see a strange illusion. A huge ferocious dragon stands right in front of you. His claws dug into the hot ground and his nostrils are distended. It makes a loud roar that fills everything.

Dragon easily exhales a thin stream of fire that burns your hand. Slowly the consciousness returns to you and you realize that the dragon is real. You realize that you\'re going to die. And at this moment you think that the dragon is fabulously beautiful.

You stand still and look right into the dragon\'s eyes. Inside them you feel an ancient power. It seems that the dragon is studying you, touches the darkest corners of the soul. Suddenly, the dragon lowers his head in humility and clears your way.

You see a wonderful land in front of you. The arch of a beautiful rainbow shines in the sky. Fields of fragrant flowers are spreading around. The Golden road leads you to a strange-shaped castle made of material unknown in your area.
You come to the castle, and an old man in long clothes blocks your way. You can hear that he\'s greeting you, but it looks like he didn\'t open his mouth. The words just sounded in your head.
Suddenly you feel that you can\'t move and talk. Something very ancient is affecting you. The old man bewitched you!
It seems your will has become so strong, that helped you overcome ancient spell. You can move and talk again.\n\n You say:

The old magician says to you:\n " Stranger, don't be angry at me. Different people come here, and many of them have a dark soul. My spell can be overcomen only by those who have strong will and pure thoughts."

The magician replies to you:\n "I see you're a man of strong will. I have something for you. This is the Sword of a thousand truths. If he falls into the hands of a man with very strong will, then he can crush the whole army."
Take the Sword of a thousand truths
You\'ve come a long way. It\'s time to go home. You will bring victory to your people. You will bring with you not only a magic sword, but also your steel willpower.
You see a big old chest on the side of the road. It is inscribed in a language you do not know.
You find some strange stone inside. When you look at it, words are heard in your head: "You are only as lazy or lacking in willpower as you think you are."
My Lord, I\'m a simple blacksmith. How can I help you?
My Lord, I\'m ready to give my life for the Kingdom
My King, for you I\'ll go to the edge of the world
My Lord, I know what the Eastern lands are dangerous. But I\'ll try to get back with the spell
Tell that you have urgent order from the King, and go through the gates
Thank him and traverse the gates
What\'s so special about Arden forest?
Thank him and go through the gates
Wake up with a quiet groan
Grab the stick and thrust into the wolf\'s neck
Approach the tree and read the inscription
Temper curiosity and continue the journey
Set foot on the dry lands
Don\'t pay attention and go further
Overnight at the foot of the mountain
I thought something happened to me. But now everything is in order.
That wasn\'t the most warm welcome in my life
My Kingdom is in danger. The king sent me to you for a secret weapon
